zigLeftThree

public int zigLeftThree()
Makes the FastZigZagRobot attempt to move diagonally towards his left three times. The robot remains facing the same direction.

Returns:
the number of completed diagonal moves

zagRightThree

public int zagRightThree()
Makes the FastZigZagRobot attempt to move diagonally towards his right three times. The robot remains facing the same direction.

Returns:
the number of completed diagonal moves
